TestGroupDocumentation.Title: minExclusive1 GetSet Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the content of trees got by unmarshalling of the minExclusive-1.xsd based XML documents and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a short restricted SimpleType with minExclusive value -32768. Various XML documents specify various values in the element.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short minExclusive-1.xsd, unmarshalled content tree GetSet test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls minExclusive-1-1.xml,...,minExclusive-1-5.xml documents which specify the values -32767, 26373, -12177, 31715, 32767 for the short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-minExclusive-1 element and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified in xml value, then invokes elemObj.setValue(short), elemObj.getValue() should return set value.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short minExclusive-1.xsd GetSet test for dynamically created content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-minExclusive-1 type with the values -32767, 26373, -12177, 31715, 32767 and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified values, then invokes elemObj.setValue(short) with various values, elemObj.getValue() should return set values.
